title: Why is Corey so Bad at League of Legends
body: Alright, i have a friend named Corey who regularly plays League of Legends. The problem is, he is complete and utter garbage. He wants to become an Azir main but cannot hit his ultimate or simply have a good KDA in ANY games, he's really trash. My friends and I decided we should make him learn the core game mechanics of a midlaner by making him play Annie, as he cannot do simple things such as CSing. He sucks ass. He can't hit his annie ultimate, watch his stun or even CS with Annie q. Is there any way he can stop? Thank you for your time <3.

replies.body: Sounds like Corey should be playing {{champion:86}}
Some people are just completely untalented in everything. its a shame
Get LS to coach him on how to play annie and garen and do a op.gg review
make him play the tutorial (option lower then beginner bots) and make him turn music volume down so all he can hear is the character and the lady teaching you

he's level 55 on league of legends, he has played the tutorial and understands the basics, he's just bad

Why not let him play someone like Akali, Ziggs, or even Kennen?

did a rioter actually delete my messages cuz if so how the hellodomblo did they not see this offensive post to ya boi corey and take it down m9er349969!!111{{champion:157}} {{summoner:1}} {{summoner:13}} {{item:3194}}
If the man enjoys the game despite his lack of skill then that's all that matters.
you should be linking him azir games by higher elo players
Let him play azir, people learn through playing it might take him 1 week, or 2 years, but eventually he will learn basic mechanics and skills with that champion then translate it to others

I mean if i were you Id not play with him until he does learn the basics, and tell him why you arent playing with him.

He will either get fed up of sucking ass and not being carried eventually.

Or you will learn that corey is insanely stupid and learn to avoid him irl.

Its win-win
